name: happy The Game
description:
ENG

HappyTheGame is a very funny game where you are a happy face soldier who must rescue the queen of badfaces.

There are many levels and your kingna will be imprisoned until you arrive and the ransoms.

ESP

HappyTheGame es un juego muy divertido en donde eres un soldado carita feliz que debera rescatar a la reyna de los badfaces.

hay muchos niveles y tu reyna estara encarcelada hasta que llegues tu y la rescates.
